customer_name: Wilson Horse and Mule Sale Inc

citations.desc: Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers.
citations.narrative:
Review of the September 2024 auction records shows that DW consigned and sold 10 female hedgehogs (cage tag
numbers 2255, 2257, 2258, 2261, 2262, 2263, 2264, 2265 and 2266-2 females in cage) without a valid USDA license.
During the same auction, SH consigned and sold 4 coatimundis (cage tag 2427 one female mountain coatimundi and
cage tag 2428 with one male and 2 female white nose coatimundis) without a valid USDA license. Neither consignor held
a current, valid USDA license under the Animal Welfare Act as required to sell these exotic animal species. No one time
exemption was noted on file. The auction facility may not consign any animal from a person required to be licensed but
who does not hold a current valid unsuspended license.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.132(d)  Repeat
   
Procurement of dogs, cats, and other animals; dealers. 
Review of the September 2024 auction records shows that DW consigned and sold 10 female hedgehogs (cage tag 
numbers 2255, 2257, 2258, 2261, 2262, 2263, 2264, 2265 and 2266-2 females in cage) without a valid USDA license. 
During the same auction, SH consigned and sold 4 coatimundis (cage tag 2427 one female mountain coatimundi and 
cage tag 2428 with one male and 2 female white nose coatimundis) without a valid USDA license. Neither consignor held 
a current, valid USDA license under the Animal Welfare Act as required to sell these exotic animal species. No one time 
exemption was noted on file. The auction facility may not consign any animal from a person required to be licensed but 
who does not hold a current valid unsuspended license. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
